page.title: 03FASHION IN WALKDEN
page.content: FASHION IN WALKDEN Today it's big and baggy.Big shirts,small collars,jackets with large lapels, brightly coloured floral designs and silky drop waist dresses are the fashion. Pleated skirts and famous name sportswear are known to be "with it". For hair perms and spikes are in for both boys and girls. Jet black or plum are the in hair dyes of the moment. Pearls are best for jewelry.Brooches are usually worn(in place of a bow tie) at the top of the shirt or on the lapel of the jacket.This is because the shirts have very small collars.Skirts can be worn any length but trousers and dungarees are all worn 'cropped' as cut_offs.Leather jackets and tight mini_skirts are also in so is body_popping and 'breaking'. BY PENNY BATTERSBY
